Detailed Description

\class CTCLSynchronizeCommand CTCLSynchronizeCommand.h Implements a Tcl command extension sync {script}

The script parameter is simply evaluated. Since this class is derived from CDAQTCLProcessor, however the script is executed syncrhonized to the application's global mutex.
